result.arabic_text: لَّا يَأۡتِيهِ ٱلۡبَٰطِلُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ يَدَيۡهِ وَلَا مِنۡ خَلۡفِهِۦۖ تَنزِيلٞ مِّنۡ حَكِيمٍ حَمِيدٖ
result.translation: 42. Baatil fooca-le gambik kaat mayamaataay, derre-le gambik kaat mayamaataay, usuk tu-kaat ossaanaah tu-kaak daggoysaanamak daccarsime kitab kinni, Yallay fayla leeh naggaarah yanih kabuk obsimeemih sabbatah.
